name: KitchenWARE
description:
A WarioWare type game where you play minigames based on events in and around a restaurant environment!
The game has finished early prototype and is in the phase of early access! We are hoping to get a full time artist to create better artwork that will fit the game! Please enjoy!

-10 minigames/levels

-Normal and Hard Modes for each game!

-Multiple different genre types!

-Made with UE4
